All parent child must sign write consent/assent order participate . Two group child recruit : child diagnose ( primary diagnosis ) GAD match , healthy control . Families choose participate ask make two visit Children 's National . During first visit , child caregiver ask complete self- parent-report form , well diagnostic interview . Children also administer abbreviated intelligence test . During second visit , optional component study , participant ( one parent ) stay overnight Children 's National child undergo overnight sleep ( polysomnographic ) evaluation . Between visit , participant wear wrist actigraphs seven day . An actigraph small device look like watch measure sleep wake period .
